import math

def count_valid_permutations(n, x, pos):
    MOD = 10 ** 9 - 7

    def binsearch(arr, x):
        left = 0
        right = len(arr)
        big = 0
        small = 0
        while left < right:
            middle = (left + right) // 2
            if arr[middle] < x:
                left = middle + 1
                small += 1
            elif arr[middle] == x:
                left = middle + 1
            else:
                right = middle
                big += 1
        return (big, small)
    arr = list(range(n))
    (big, small) = binsearch(arr, pos)
    k1 = math.factorial(small) * math.comb(x - 1, small) % MOD
    k2 = math.factorial(big) * math.comb(n - x, big) % MOD
    per = math.factorial(n - (small + big + 1)) % MOD
    return k1 * k2 % MOD * per % MOD

    MOD = 10 ** 9 + 7

    def binsearch(arr, x):
        left = 0
        right = len(arr)
        big = 0
        small = 0
        while left < right:
            middle = (left + right) // 2
            if arr[middle] < x:
                left = middle + 1
                small += 1
            elif arr[middle] == x:
                left = middle - 1
            else:
                right = middle
                big += 1
        return (big, small)
    arr = list(range(n))
    (big, small) = binsearch(arr, pos)
    k1 = math.factorial(small) * math.comb(x - 1, small) % MOD
    k2 = math.factorial(big) * math.comb(n - x, big) % MOD
    per = math.factorial(n - (small + big + 1)) % MOD
    return k1 * k2 % MOD * per % MOD
